title: People being scammed on a daily basis as AI videos, images getting more convincing
description: KUALA LUMPUR: The public has been urged to stay vigilant against the emergence of artificial intelligence (AI)-generated videos and images depicting royalty, politicians and prominent individuals who purportedly promote investment schemes, says Datuk Seri Michael Chong.

title: Is artificial intelligence set to transform India’s legal sector?
description: Artificial intelligence is increasingly influencing legal work in India, but experts say its role will remain supportive rather than replacing human judgement, ethics and emotional intelligence.
content: Artificial intelligence is being embedded across sectors, from healthcare and manufacturing to finance, education, and governance, reshaping how data-heavy work is carried out. In healthcare, AI supports faster diagnostics and predictive analysis. Fi... [5454 chars]

title: US software stocks slammed on fears over AI disruption
description: Shares of US software and data services companies extended their tumble for a seventh straight session yesterday as investors worried that fast-advancing artificial intelligence tools could upend the sector.
content:

title: AI fear wipes 6% off Nifty IT: Rahul Shah warns about tech valuations, flags safer bets
description: Indian IT stocks are experiencing a sharp decline. Experts warn that Artificial Intelligence is disrupting the traditional IT business model. This is leading to concerns about future growth and company valuations. Investors are advised to consider other sectors like textiles and defense for better opportunities. The coming quarters will show if IT companies can adapt to AI-driven services.

title: 'Use AI To Learn, Not To Waste Time': PM Modi’s Advice To Students At Pariksha Pe Charcha 2026
description: During Pariksha Pe Charcha, Prime Minister Narendra Modi spoke on the responsible use of artificial intelligence, advising students to treat AI as a learning aid rather than a shortcut. He said the right questions can turn AI into a partner that builds curiosity, clarity and independent thinking.
